channel.title: New Features & Releases on
channel.description: Recent content in New Features & Releases on

item.title: SeaChat Release History
item.description: 4/9/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Enhanced References feature: When users enable the References feature in the Advanced Settings page and have configured the Zendesk ticket search tool, if the AI agent’s response includes content from Zendesk tickets, the system will display the relevant ticket numbers and titles in the references area, making it easier to track information sources. 4/1/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Knowledge Base Refinement: Users can now configure whether to refine knowledge base search results and customize instructions for the LLM in the Agent Information’s Advanced Settings page on how to optimize these results, enhancing AI agent performance when answering user queries.
